Description:
Wide Corner Terrace, Wonderful Parkland Location
Expressions Of Interest Closing 1st June 2020 At 5:00pm
** Inspections strictly by registration - Please contact the listing agent to arrange. Our inspection guidelines and policies for attendance can be viewed by visiting: https://bit.ly/CollinsSimmsCOVID-19 **
It's the exceptional list of extras that set this freestanding three bedroom Victorian apart from the rest: impressive extra-width, quiet north-side Kiewa Street frontage, cathedral ceiling open-plan living plus rear ROW. Ideally located in a coveted parklands pocket enjoying Merri Creek and Yarra River trails, this tuckpointed Hawthorn brick corner terrace represents a unique opportunity for an absolutely superb lifestyle near cafes, schools, Clifton Hill train station and inner-city shopping precincts. The single-level layout with previously-extended living area is perfectly composed and completely comfortable, and with a simple refurbishment would be stunning. Alternatively, a luxury renovation (STCA) is an enticing option to introduce further space and value. As it currently stands, this inviting period residence offers main bedroom with classic features (ceiling rose, gutter cornice, double windows, open fireplace), spacious living and dining room adjoining a functional kitchen (polished concrete floor, soaring trussed ceiling, double-glazed bifold doors), bright bathroom, separate laundry, gas ducted heating, side court access with storage and sunny rear courtyard garden. Excellent location, exciting potential, extraordinary opportunity!

Description:
Inner Urban Living & Lifestyle At Your Doorstep
As you enter you will be instantly impressed with the functional floor plan and immaculate condition and of this modern tri-level townhouse. This exceptional low-maintenance home comprises of three generously proportioned bedrooms, two with balconies and the master with a WIR which leads into the central bathroom with separate shower and bath, a galley style kitchen with quality stainless steel European appliances and dishwasher, an expansive living and dining zone that opens out onto the paved al fresco entertaining area perfect for entertaining, relaxing or bringing everyone together.
You will be instantly drawn to the magnificent city skyline views and additional features which include a powder room, a separate concealed laundry, polished parquetry flooring, high ceilings, ample storage throughout, split system air-conditioning, ducted heating, security entrance with intercom and a remote-controlled carport.
Located in one of Melbournes most desirable inner-city locations adjacent from Clifton Hill train station, and only a short stroll to Clifton Hill Village, Collingwood Leisure Centre, Queens Parade shops and the Darling Gardens.

This unique Clifton Hill offering commands a prized inner city address, strolling distance to village shops and trains, vibrant Smith Street and a selection of quality schools. Further on, a connecting central hallway leads to an office with a kitchenette, two huge bedrooms, a large third bedroom, plus an external laundry and bathroom. Also outside is a good sized backyard, garden sheds, an extra w/c and roller door access to off street parking. Complete with high ceilings and good existing proportions, it features split system a/c and decorative ceilings.

Description:
"Pensilva" - a sublime family sanctuary near parklands
An historic heart, contemporary soul and free-flowing family spirit are held in a beautiful reverence with architect-extended 'Pensilva'; a stunning freestanding Victorian in an extra broad and deep landscaped setting. Originally the mill manager's home as he came and went to the nearby Yarra River's Dights Falls, this captivating 1800s residence with its decorative arched hallway and high ornate ceilings, welcomes all with wide open arms from an immediately engaging past into a spacious and sophisticated present. Featured in Home Beautiful, the hub of the house is a double-sized family living and dining space where a timber-slatted wall and towering double-glazed stackers connect the inside with out to a large deck-trimmed lawn - perfect for kids' play and secluded alfresco entertaining. The original stable and hay loft have been incorporated into the design creating an upstairs parents' retreat cloaked in a soft white palette highlighted by a trussed timber ceiling, separate study, walk-in robe and ensuite. An exquisite rose and chandelier crown a gorgeous central living room (wood heater) that leads to 2 further big bedrooms (BIRs), laundry and luxurious family bathroom with walk-in shower and freestanding bath on natural bluestone floor tiles. Adjoining the light-filled family zone on large-format, concrete-look porcelain tiles is a streamlined modern kitchen with pale stone surfaces and Ilve/Bosch appliances. Additional features include ducted heating/cooling, alarm, custom joinery, attic storage and Baltic pine floors. 'Pensilva' is peacefully tucked away in an inner-city parklands pocket by the Merri Creek and Yarra River just moments to cafes, schools, walking/cycling trails, shopping precincts and Clifton Hill station. Dual frontage to quiet Clifford Place creates easy access for secure off-street parking with remote-control door.

We also appreciate your understanding if you are requested to wait outside to reduce the number of people in the property at a time.
Thank you for your understanding.

Description:
Magnificent Victorian family home in the prized heart of Clifton Hill
This magnificent c1900 Victorian residence has been transformed for family living. Fusing period splendour and modern comfort, it boasts a deluxe free flowing design and private alfresco entertaining with ROW access. It is set in a historic Clifton Hill streetscape, strolling distance to Darling Gardens, city trains, local schools and Queens Parade village. The elevated lattice facade reveals a leadlight entrance and wide arched hallway leading to three large bedrooms with built-ins, a superb lounge or fourth bedroom, generous home office and sparkling twin bathroom. Flooded in natural light at the back is a huge living area with a gas fireplace, spacious dining area, gourmet stone kitchen with European gas fixtures, and pristine bathroom/laundry with a shower over a bath. French doors open onto a sun-drenched entertaining deck, extensive lush private garden and double carport with laneway access. This beautiful family home features soaring ceilings, timber floors, ducted heating/cooling, a Bosch alarm, two ornate fireplaces, a water tank and garden shed.
